config_name: Binary Frequency - caffeine limit 5 of 7 days

configuration_json.formula: if (days_meeting_threshold >= required_days) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Success requires caffeine ≤400mg on at least 5 of 7 days per week
